app.text_info: This app is created by locals and experts. As you can see, it's also free of charge. Please let us know if you want to contribute with your experience, enrich the content, correct inaccuracies, or submit pictures.
app.text_acknowledge: This quick app is an open-source project powered by open data and enriched by the community. Most of the information was extracted from Wikidata, OpenStreetMaps, and other public sources. You can find inaccuracies, so we apologize in advance.
app.text_feedback: Please let us know if you want to contribute with your experience, enrich the content, correct inaccuracies, or submit pictures. This app is created by locals and experts.

pois.name: Brickyard
pois.description: Brickyard is a 21 and over bar located on Dauphin Street in downtown Mobile. There is a $5 cover. There are pool tables and live music. There is also an outdoor patio with an additional bar. They also have benches and cornhole located outside.

pois.name: Odalys Irish Pub
pois.description: Odalys is a 21 year old and over bar located in downtown Mobile. They have three different bars located inside of the bar. There is also an outside area with cornhole.

pois.name: Electric Piano Bar
pois.description: The Electric Piano Bar is a 21 year old and over bar located in donwtown Mobile. They have a $7 cover to enter the bar. There is an upstairs seating area that overlooks the downstairs bar. They have live, fun, and upbeat music. They also have a penny pitcher deal on Thursdays.

pois.name: Saddle Up Saloon
pois.description: Saddle Up Saloon is a bar located in downtown Mobile. You have to be 18 years old or older to enter and 21 or over to be served. They have drink specials on Thursday nights. They have a $5 cover after 10:00 PM.

pois.name: Old Majestic Brewing Company
pois.description: Old Majestic Brewing Company is a bar located in downtown Mobile. This bar brews all of their beer in house. They have pool tables and arcade games. There is also outdoor seating and a fire pit.

pois.name: BoHaydens
pois.description: BoHaydens is a new bar located in downtown Mobile. You have to be 21 years old or older to enter the bar. They have golf simulators inside of the bar. If you wear the merchandise that is listed on their website, you will recieve happy hour prices at any time that you would like to go to the bar.
